title: Encountered errors while bringing up the project.
body:
Hi guys. I build project by "docker-compose build" command and now when i run 
"docker-compose run --rm api python3 manage.py migrate" command this error happen: 

note: i kill all container before run this command

```bash
Creating saleor-platform_db_1 ... 
Creating saleor-platform_redis_1 ... 
Creating saleor-platform_db_1     ... error
WARNING: Host is already in use by another container
WARNING: Host is already in use by another container

Creating saleor-platform_redis_1  ... error
5103c627fb3df33a41b639358a361414bb22cf2fc56de6a3e6b831): Error starting userland proxy: listen tcp 0.0.0.0:5432: bind: address already in use

ERROR: for saleor-platform_redis_1  Cannot start service redis: driver failed programming external connectivity on endpoint saleor-platform_redis_1 (8d400108c512079710fd31f8fabdca6af000dc11b82800b9af11777ffb8aa7fb): Error starting userland proxy: listen tcp 0.0.0.0:6379: bind: address already in use

ERROR: for db  Cannot start service db: driver failed programming external connectivity on endpoint saleor-platform_db_1 (118e1df22d5103c627fb3df33a41b639358a361414bb22cf2fc56de6a3e6b831): Error starting userland proxy: listen tcp 0.0.0.0:5432: bind: address already in use

ERROR: for redis  Cannot start service redis: driver failed programming external connectivity on endpoint saleor-platform_redis_1 (8d400108c512079710fd31f8fabdca6af000dc11b82800b9af11777ffb8aa7fb): Error starting userland proxy: listen tcp 0.0.0.0:6379: bind: address already in use
ERROR: Encountered errors while bringing up the project.```

*   Operating System: ubuntu 18.04
*   Python Version Used: 3.8
*   docker Version Used: 19.03.9
